content: Tommaso ha la Bibbia in nove lingue: spagnolo, esperanto, francese, greco, ungherese, inglese, latino, portoghese e russo.
translations: eng:Thomas has the Bible in nine languagesï¹• Spanish, Esperanto, French, Greek, Hungarian, English, Latin, Portuguese and Rus
